title: Council Coffee Briefing
details: City beat reporters host a breezy drop-in with council members previewing the night's zoning votes; Corner Hearth pastries mysteriously vanish faster than anyone can refill them.

title: Dispatch Photo Archive Preview
details: A softly lit walk-through of never-before-seen Dispatch negatives, where curator Simone Reyes shares behind-the-lens stories that feel almost like Foxhollow folklore.

title: Winter Night Market
details: Artists, growers, and food trucks turn Depot Hall into a glowing twilight bazaar, complete with warm cider tastings and letterpress demos that leave your fingers dusted with inky wonder.

title: Blue Heron Trail Cleanup
details: Park rangers lead a spruce-up after last week’s winds; gloves, bags, and an improbably cheerful coffee truck await volunteers along the river’s morning mist.

title: Lantern Walk & Folk Session
details: A twilight lantern stroll through winding arboretum paths ends with an acoustic trio debuting tunes inspired by quirky Dispatch archive moments.

title: Kids Maker Lab: Mini Rovers
details: Engineers help young builders assemble mini rovers that attempt heroic climbs across the library’s cardboard canyon, often with theatrical sound effects.

title: Sunday Story Brunch
details: Over a cozy prix fixe brunch, Dispatch reporters share the funniest—and strangely heartwarming—reader tips that landed in the inbox this winter.

title: Evening Seed Swap & Soil Chat
details: Master gardeners host a seed swap among warm greenhouse lights, offering soil tips while everyone trades envelopes labeled in increasingly fanciful handwriting.

title: Local Voices Audio Lab
details: Residents digitize old family tapes with gentle help from Dispatch audio producers; unexpected snippets of Foxhollow history often emerge between rewinds.

title: Sunrise Bird Outing
details: Naturalists guide a dawn walk where wintering waterfowl glide through the calm marsh; binocular loaners and hushed excitement are both plentiful.

title: Baby Social Hour & Stroller Swap
details: Babies and toddlers convene for an early-evening babble session while caregivers swap lightly used gear and compare notes on Foxhollow’s smoothest stroller-friendly shortcuts.

title: Winter Ramen Night
details: Chef Marcus Wei teaches broth magic while guests assemble steaming bowls; a side tasting of house-made pickles provides tangy comic relief.
